import sys

n, a = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
x = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
x.append(a)
x.sort()
print(x[-1] - x[0])

















































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































import sys

x = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
x.append(a)
x.sort()

def main():
    n, a = map(int, input().split())
    x = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x.insert(0, a)
    x.sort()
    print(x[n - 1] - x[0])


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import math
n, a = map(int, input().split())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))
x.sort()
print(math.fabs(a - x[0]) + math.fabs(a - x[-1]))
